This silenced her parents.

"Hmph!" Raven muttered, crossing her arms.

Because of his generosity, we got married after I got this new body, and now we're expecting a child. And if my child has to become just a head due to an accident, both my husband and I will care for him or her, instead of running away. Now get out!"

One day, 24 year old Lucy Dawson was walking pass an adoption care center for pet heads. She decided to take a look since it seems interesting. She went in and saw a counter and went through it. She decided to go to the female section.

Going through here is like a zoo. Lucy gets to see a variety of heads. From children to adults, there is just so many. However this time she saw one that stands out. "Please do."

"Why did you decided on being a pet head?"

"To be honest, I only did for the sake of my family. You see, I used to be a farm girl, but there was this opportunity to earn some cash if I was part of this experiment. I did and was known as one of the first pet heads."

"Since High school. This does remind me on how I wasn't able to meet my family again for a while."

"That's awful. Maybe I will adopt you and swap our heads so that you could live a full life again."

"What about you?"

"Well, I don't have a family too and I think you will look pretty on my body. My messy long blond hair is no match for yours."

"I accept your offer and I promise to take care of you."

So Lucy picked up Lizzy and went to the counter. After some time, the two really switched places. Lucy is the head and Lizzy has her body.

153.content:
You liked being a head, you did. You wouldn't have stayed like this for over two years now if you didn't at least enjoy it on some level. Still, if you had to be honest you were growing a bit bored without any body, and while Jan did her best to keep you entertained over the past two months that you had been her pet she still was unable to make you want to stay a head forever. You wanted to have a body again. She was rather understanding of your plight for someone who had had a body all her life, and was willing to make a compromise. She'd switch places with you, allowing you to have her body while she became your new pet head for the next two weeks, at which point you'd switch back. If you still felt that you wanted a body you'd buy a new one and officially become normal again. If however you preferred belonging to Jan she'd get to keep you. It was more than a fair trade.
Today was the day you'd make the switch, and while you were still a bit apprehensive about taking Jan's body what with it being sixteen to your twenty four (something the other heads and even some of Jan's friends insulted you over as pet heads were typically supposed to be younger than the owner, though you liked Jan enough that it didn't really matter to you), coffee brown to your pasty white, and probably the biggest elephant in the room female to your original male, she was still being incredibly kind in loaning it to you in the first place so you weren't about to look this gift horse in the mouth too hard. "Janette Delroy and Oliver Paulson?" A nurse called, her number having come up in the queue.
"Here." She chirped. "Also, call me Jan!"
The nurse nodded. "Alright Jan. Anything special you'd like me to call you?" The nurse asked you.
"Ollie, if you wouldn't mind." You inform her. While you hadn't skateboarded since you gave up your body for obvious reasons you still enjoyed your old nickname. You also enjoyed the look, and had had Jan continue to groom you in such a way. Hair a bit longer than usual for a dude,a scraggly beard, and typically wearing some kind of beanie. Funny enough you actually could grow a full beard quite easily if you really wanted to, you just kept it on the mangy side for stylistic reasons though you had considered shaving it while you were on Jan's body. You'd cross that bridge when it came, for right now the operation, which you were being carried off to.
They performed some routine physicals first, poking and prodding the two of you and measuring the diameters of your necks. Afterwards the two of you were sedated for the procedure and soooon eeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee..............

You were actually rather quick to wake up, your eyes suddenly snapping open with a jolt. "Hiya." You heard Jan say. You turn your neck, something you hadn't really done in a while come to think of it, and see her lying upright next to you, now reduced to only her head. "How are you feeling?"
You sit up, looking down at your new pretty teen body. "Not quite as tall." You say, then correct yourself. "Well, taller than I was yesterday I guess." After a few moments a nurse enters and gives you two a final physical to make sure everything worked as it should and you were on your way, leaving no more than 2 hours after you arrived.
"So, what do you want to do now that you've got a body again?" Jan asked, looking up at you.

It wasn't bad it just was rather tight in areas you would prefer it to be loose; maybe Jan liked the fit this way or had gotten used to the feel but it felt rather odd and somewhat uncomfortable to you.

"Oh, I didn't even think of that! Yeah it has been getting a bit hot out lately." She notes, perking up as she bought your excuse. You and Jan caught a bus back to her home, catching some odd looks but otherwise being unbothered. As you rode the bus you shifted your weight in your seat, trying to get comfortable in Jan's body. You weren't really sure if it was her body specifically or if it was just because you'd gone without any body for such a long stretch of time but for some reason you couldn't manage to find a comfortable sitting position. Your rear and legs felt more squishy than they should and while you liked to cross your arms across your waist before doing so no pressed your breasts together in a way that, while admittedly nice feeling also made you feel a bit weird at the same time. Sometime in the future, doctors and scientists have found a way to to keep a person's severed head alive. Thanks to advanced technology, people's heads can survive decapitation. Thus, many of these heads want to be adopted as pets. The technology has caused them to move around just by rolling their heads. In addition, they can also levitate themselves.

Some heads want bodies, while some people with bodies want to be only heads. Thus, head dismemberment has been popular with most. Very few people, if any, have died from these operations. As a result, medical science has improved in the future.

FACTS:
Heads can levitate.
Heads can roll.
Heads are practically immortal after decapitation.
Heads require a body to reproduce.
Scientists can attach heads to new bodies, regardless of difference in skin tone, age, or even gender.
Two to three heads can be attached to a body at one time. In fact, two-headed and three-headed people are accepted in society. This is the only way that polygamy is accepted.
Pet heads cannot marry full-bodied humans, unless they are attached to bodies.
